channel.title: [508] Connecting to update server... Error
channel.description:
I've just made a switch from a 317 server to a 508 and every time I load the client the loading bar keeps getting stuck at "Connecting to update server" and gives me the js5 connect error. I've been searching all over google to try and resolve this but everything says the same thing; I DID run the source first, I AM 100% port forwarded correctly, the client ip IS set to 127.0.0.1. But I still get the error for any server 508+. I was running my 317 fine then I turned the computer off to move it and turned it back on and now it wont run. I get "Error connecting to server. Please try using a different world" in the 317 now.. Can anybody help me? I've been trying to fix this all day every day for the past week but nothing is working. also, I'm a little new to running servers. I ran my 317 and coded it for about 3 weeks. So that being said, there might be something I missed? Please help.
Pictures:
http://s1305.beta.photobucket.com/user/cody_griffin1/media/adsdf.png.html
http://s1305.beta.photobucket.com/user/cody_griffin1/media/Asd.jpg.html
http://s1305.beta.photobucket.com/user/cody_griffin1/media/adasda.jpg.html
http://s1305.beta.photobucket.com/user/cody_griffin1/media/dsasa.jpg.html
That should be everything right?^

item.title: [508] Connecting to update server... Error

I’ve just made a switch from a 317 server to a 508 and every time I load the client the loading bar keeps getting stuck at “Connecting to update server” and gives me the js5 connect error.
